src:
Menikmati Syahdunya Senja Bali Barat Ditemani Musik Indie
03 Nov 2019, 10:57 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Astrid, Balawan, Dialog Dini Hari, serta Jamie Aditya sukses membuat senja di Bali Barat makin indah dengan senadung lagu yang memesona penonton. (CNN Indonesia/Martahan Sohuturon)

Bali, CNN Indonesia -- Suasana senja di kawasan Taman Nasional Bali Barat (TNBB) meriah pada Sabtu (2/11). Kemeriahan tercipta berkat kehadiran empat musisi indie di atas panggung Plataran Menjangan Xtravaganza 2019.Sinar matahari yang awalnya terasa terik menyengat di sekitar lokasi di Plataran L'Harmonie, Menjangan, Bali pun menjadi sejuk dalam seketika setelah Astrid Sulaiman, Balawan, Dialog Dini Hari, serta Jamie Aditya melantunkan sejumlah lagu andalannya.Ratusan pasang mata yang hadir pun ikut bersenandung.Astrid menjadi pembuka acara yang mengawinkan unsur musik dengan budaya dan lingkungan tersebut. Ia membuka acara dengan baik lewat sejumlah karyanya. Ia berhasil 'menggelitik' telinga penonton. Pun begitu dengan Balawan. Musisi berusia 46 tahun tersebut memainkan dua lagu yakni berjudul Forest dan Keroncong Kemayoran di atas panggung.Selain itu, Balawan juga sempat memamerkan kemampuannya memetik gitar dengan berkolaborasi bersama dua orang rekannya yang memainkan gamelan. Mereka pun memanjakan telinga dan mata para penonton dengan musik instrumental.Senja di Bali Barat makin terasa menyenangkan dan syahdu. Selanjutnya, giliran Dialog Dini Hari yang beraksi di atas panggung. Band yang digawangi Brozio Orah pada bass, Dadang Pranoto pada gitar dan vokal, serta Deny Surya pada drum ini membawakan sejumlah lagu andalannya yaitu Pohon Tua Bersandar, Lengkung Langit, Cahaya Perkasa, Pelangi, Hyena, Tentang Rumahku, serta Jerit Sisa.Jamie kemudian menjadi penampil terakhir di panggung Plataran Menjangan Xtravaganza 2019. Mantan VJ MTV itu membawakan beberapa lagu bergenre jazz milik sejumlah penyanyi ternama yang sukses membuat penonton bergoyang seperti Can't Put That Monkey On My Back karya Riley Puckett dan Your Feet's too Big milik Fats Waller.Kemudian Jamie membawakan dua lagu Billie Holiday yaitu It's Like Reaching for the Moon dan The Blues are Brewin'. Ia memungkas penampilannya sekaligus panggung Plataran Menjangan Xtravaganza 2019 dengan lagu Harlem On a Saturday Night yang dipopulerkan Lil Hardin Armstrong.(mts/chs)
text:
Enjoying Syahdunya Dusk in West Bali Accompanied by Indie Music
03 Nov 2019, 10:57 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Astrid, Balawan, Early Day Dialogue, and Jamie Aditya successfully made dusk in West Bali even more beautiful with a song that fascinated the audience. (CNN Indonesia / Martahan Sohuturon)

Bali, CNN Indonesia - The atmosphere of dusk in the area of the West Bali National Park (TNBB) is lively on Saturday (2/11). The excitement was created thanks to the presence of four indie musicians on the Plataran Menjangan Xtravaganza 2019. The sun's rays which were initially blazing were stinging around the location at the Plataran L'Harmonie, Menjangan, Bali became cool in an instant after Astrid Sulaiman, Balawan, Early Morning Dialogue, and Jamie Aditya sang a number of her flagship songs. Hundreds of pairs of eyes that were present also hummed. Astrid became the opening act of the event that wed music with its culture and environment. He opened the program well through a number of his works. He managed to 'tickle' the ears of the audience. Even so with Balawan. The 46-year-old musician played two songs namely Forest and Keroncong Kemayoran on the stage. In addition, Balawan also showed his ability to play guitar by collaborating with two colleagues who played gamelan. They also spoiled the ears and eyes of the audience with instrumental music. Senja in West Bali increasingly feels fun and solemn. Next, it was the turn of the Early Day Dialogue on stage. The band, which was directed by Brozio Orah on bass, Dadang Pranoto on guitar and vocals, and Deny Surya on drums, delivered a number of flagship songs, namely the Old Tree Leaning, Curved Sky, Mighty Light, Pelangi, Hyena, About My Home, and Scream of Remnant. the last performer on the Plataran Menjangan Xtravaganza 2019. Former VJ MTV brought a number of jazz songs belonging to a number of famous singers who successfully made the audience sway like Riley Puckett's Can't Put That Monkey On My Back and Your Feet's too Big by Fats Waller. Jamie performed two Billie Holiday songs, It's Like Reaching for the Moon and The Blues are Brewin '. He concluded his performance as well as the stage of Plataran Menjangan Xtravaganza 2019 with the song Harlem On a Saturday Night which was popularized by Lil Hardin Armstrong. (Mts / chs)
